name: Ridley Helium/X-Night'13+, Fenix SL/Noah SL'15+ Ha
categories: Derailleur hangers, pulley wheels and parts
description: A replacement derailleur hanger for the 2013 and later Ridley® Helium, X-Trails, or X-Night. Also compatible with 2015 and later Fenix SL and Noah SL.Ridley part number is HANRCERID033.
